title: Why Intelligent Design Fails (Critique) c2004 Young + Edis
description:
Why Intelligent Design Fails: A Scientific Critique of the New Creationism (c2004), edited by Matt Young & Taner Edis.

eBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://rutgerspress.rutgers.edu/%28S%28g5iiqoegihbmvq45aivzafui%29%29/product/Why-Intelligent-Design-Fails,3311.aspx" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://rutgerspress.rutgers.edu/%28S%28g5iiqoegihbmvq45aivzafui%29%29/product/Why-Intelligent-Design-Fails,3311.aspx</a>

CONTENTS:
Introduction - Matt Young and Taner Edis
1. Grand Themes, Narrow Constituency - Taner Edis
2. Grand Designs and Facile Analogies - Matt Young
3. Common Descent - Gert Korthof
4. Darwin's Transparent Box - David Ussery
5. Evolutionary Paths to Irreducible Systems - Alan D. Gishlick
6. Evolution of the Bacterial Flagellum - Ian Musgrave
7. Self-Organization and the Origin of Complexity - Niall Shanks and Istvan Karsai
8. The Explanatory Filter, Archaeology, and Forensics - Gary S. Hurd
9. Playing Games with Probability - Jeffrey Shallit and Wesley Elsberry
10. Chance and Necessity-and Intelligent Design? - Taner Edis
11. There Is a Free Lunch After All - Mark Perakh
12. Is the Universe Fine-Tuned for Us? - Victor J. Stenger
13. Is Intelligent Design Science? - Matt Perakh and Matt Young
Appendix: List of Organizations and Web Sites - Compiled by Gary S. Hurd
References

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.


"As Christians, we know." William Dembski, "Mere Creation: Science, Faith and Intelligent Design", p.14
